CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 8, 1945. pg. 21, reads: "DRAMA DEBUT - Students of Herron Hill Junior High are shown in a scene from the operetta, 'Dawn Boy,' depicting despair of an Indian tribe.  Left to right: Jane Bennerman, storm dancer; Ben Owens, medicine man; Jimmie Moore as 'rain god,' and Charlotte Wilson, star gazer. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Calvin Lamar, Jane Bennerman, Ben Owens, Jimmie Monroe, and Charlotte Wilson in Native American inspired costumes on stage for production of operetta "Dawn Boy" at Herron Hill Junior High School
